comments.body:
Where does the RHS decrypt come from?  It appears to be undefined here.

Needs to be passed to _assemble_from_fragments as an kwarg I assume.

diffHunk:

            fragment_content = open(self._loader.get_real_file(fragment, decrypt=decrypt), 'rb').read()

            # always put a newline between fragments if the previous fragment didn't end with a newline.
